original: snang ba'i mtshan mas sems rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba'i mtshan mas sems rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the control of thought by any sign of faith or by the sign of light.

original: lhag mthong gi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: lhag mthong gi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of insight?

original: thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis chos rnams yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis chos rnams yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mental orientation to the teachings by the wisdom which arises from hearing, reflection and meditation.

original: btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of equanimity?

original: dge ba'i phyogs la sems mnyam par gyur te /
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs la sems mnyam par gyur te /
translated: It is the sign of the mind that is balanced in the wholesome.

original: lhag par btang snyoms su byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par btang snyoms su byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mind that is indifferent to the wholesome.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of concentration?

original: gzhi dang dmigs pa dang / brten par bya ba rnams kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis /🔽ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gzhi dang dmigs pa dang / brten par bya ba rnams kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'am /
translated: It is the sign of the basis, the object of the mind and the support.

original: thob zin pa sngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: thob zin pa sngon du byed pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mind that enters into concentration or that has already entered into concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnas pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /🔽mtshan ma de dag nyid legs par 'dzin pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnas pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na / mtshan ma de dag nyid legs par 'dzin pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: What is the sign of the stability of concentration?

original: legs par bzung bas na /
analyzed: legs par bzung bas na /
translated: It is the sign of the mind that is well-established in the sign of concentration.

original: ji srid du 'dod pa de srid snyoms par zhugs par gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las yongs su nyams par ma gyur pa'i chos gang dag yin pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid du 'dod pa de srid snyoms par zhugs par gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las yongs su nyams par ma gyur pa'i chos gang dag yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mind that, well-established, remains in concentration for as long as one wishes and does not fall away from that concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of emerging from concentration?

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa'i rnam par rtog pa'i lus las ma gtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa'i rnam par rtog pa'i lus las ma gtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the body of discursive thought, which is not included in the stage of meditative concentration.

original: skye ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin thob zin pa /
analyzed: skye ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin thob zin pa /
translated: What is the sign of birth?

original: phyir zhing skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin ba'o //
analyzed: phyir zhing skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin ba'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mind which is directed towards the increase and development of the concentration already acquired.

original: 'bral ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bral ba'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of separation?

original: ting nge 'dzin thob zin pa nyams pa dang / 'grib pa dang / chung ba yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob zin pa nyams pa dang / 'grib pa dang / chung ba yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the sign of the mind which is directed towards the decrease and loss of the concentration already acquired.

original: thabs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: thabs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of the means?

original: gnyi ga ste /🔽phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: gnyi ga ste / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'byung ba'am /
translated: It is both.

original: nyams par 'gyur pa'i lam gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nyams par 'gyur pa'i lam gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the path of the increase and development of the concentration already acquired, and it is the path of the decrease and loss of the concentration not yet acquired.

original: mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na /
translated: What is the sign of accomplishment?

original: tshig dang yi ge rgyas pa'i don mdor bsdu ba dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / @137a * //
analyzed: tshig dang yi ge rgyas pa'i don mdor bsdu ba dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / @137a * //
translated: the accomplishment of superknowledge, the absence of afflictions,

original: so so yang dag par rig ba dang / smon nas shes pa rnams dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la brten ba'i yon tan khyad par can nam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig ba dang / smon nas shes pa rnams dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la brten ba'i yon tan khyad par can nam /
translated: the correct understandings, the knowledge through prayer, and other special qualities based on concentration,

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'am /
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'am /
translated: the accomplishment of the powers, fearlessnesses, and so on,

original: zab mo'i don dang / tshig shes rab kyis rtogs pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zab mo'i don dang / tshig shes rab kyis rtogs pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: and the signs of realization through wisdom of the profound meaning and words.

original: mtshan ma 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: All these signs

original: mtshan ma'i rtsa ba bzhis bsdus pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rtsa ba bzhis bsdus pa yin te /
translated: are included in the four root signs.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan mas ni thams cad bsdus so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan mas ni thams cad bsdus so //
translated: The sign of the object includes all.

original: gzhi'i mtshan mas kyang bsdus te /🔽phyi ma phyi ma gsal bas na /
analyzed: gzhi'i mtshan mas kyang bsdus te / phyi ma phyi ma gsal bas na /
translated: The sign of the basis is also included.🔽Because the later basis is the basis of the later sign,

original: phyi ma'i gzhi snga ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi ma'i gzhi snga ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the later sign is clarified by the earlier basis.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba ni rnam pa thams cad du gzhi'i mtshan ma nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba ni rnam pa thams cad du gzhi'i mtshan ma nyid do //
translated: Correct application is the sign of the basis in all aspects.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: The correct application is just like that.

original: log par sbyor ba yang de dang 'dra ste /🔽gcig ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi'o //
analyzed: log par sbyor ba yang de dang 'dra ste / gcig ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi'o //
translated: The incorrect application is also like that.🔽One is on the side of virtue.

original: cig shos ni nag po'i phyogs kyi'o //
analyzed: cig shos ni nag po'i phyogs kyi'o //
translated: The other is on the side of evil.

original: de la nyon mongs pa can gyi mtshan ma ni thams cad kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa can gyi mtshan ma ni thams cad kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Of these, the defiled sign is to be completely abandoned.

original: cig shos ni bsten par bya ba ste /
analyzed: cig shos ni bsten par bya ba ste /
translated: The other is to be cultivated.

original: de dang de'i 'phral 'phral la bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de'i 'phral 'phral la bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that this is to be done immediately after that.

original: de la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la yid la byed pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la yid la byed pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
translated: How does one cultivate attention to the sign of the meditative object?

original: mtshan ma gang dang gang yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de don rnam pa bzhi byed de /🔽yid la byed ba de nyid la brten pa dang / de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa thag ring du byed pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma gang dang gang yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de don rnam pa bzhi byed de / yid la byed ba de nyid la brten pa dang / de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa thag ring du byed pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: Any attention to any sign performs four functions with regard to the object:

original: phyi ma la ches gsal bar byed pa'i phyir yid la byed pa de nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi ma la ches gsal bar byed pa'i phyir yid la byed pa de nyid dam /
translated: it makes the object present; it removes the afflictions that are adverse to it; it makes the attention itself clear, as if polishing a mirror; and it makes the object clearer in the future.

original: de las gzhan pa gsal bar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa de la brten pa na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa gsal bar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa de la brten pa na /
translated: 2. the mental attention that is based on that,

original: dmigs pa ni sun 'byin par byed /🔽nyon mongs pa ni spong bar byed /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni sun 'byin par byed / nyon mongs pa ni spong bar byed /
translated: 3. the object that is to be eliminated.🔽The mental attention that is the clear comprehender is the mental attention that is the antidote to the object that is to be eliminated.🔽The mental attention that is based on that is the mental attention that is based on the clear comprehender.🔽The object that is to be eliminated is the object that is eliminated by the mental attention that is based on that.

original: spong ba ni 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: spong ba ni 'dzin par byed /
translated: The elimination is the elimination of the object that is to be eliminated.

original: rgyu ni nyon mongs pa rnams las thag ring du byed pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu ni nyon mongs pa rnams las thag ring du byed pa ste /
translated: The cause is the cause that is far from the mental afflictions.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pa ni /
translated: The mental attention that is the sign of the object is the mental attention that is the clear comprehender.

original: de ltar sgom mo //
analyzed: de ltar sgom mo //
translated: One meditates in that way.

original: bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad ni rnam pa bzhis snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad ni rnam pa bzhis snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: One enters meditative attainment in the first meditative concentration and so on up to the summit of existence in four ways:

original: rgyu'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / lung nod pa'i stobs dang / man ngag gi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: rgyu'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / lung nod pa'i stobs dang / man ngag gi stobs kyis so //
translated: through the power of the cause, through the power of application, through the power of scriptural instruction, and through the power of personal instruction.

original: rgyu'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it through the power of the cause?

original: nye ba nye bar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no//
analyzed: nye ba nye bar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no//
translated: One enters meditative attainment in the meditative concentrations that are close.

original: @137b sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: @137b sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it through the power of application?

original: nye bar snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin du zin kyang rtag tu goms par byas pa'i dbang gis rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin du zin kyang rtag tu goms par byas pa'i dbang gis rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Even when not in meditative equipoise, one enters meditative equipoise uninterruptedly by the power of constant practice.

original: lung nod pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: lung nod pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it by the power of recitation?

original: des bsam gtan gyi dbang du bya ba'i chos mang po thos te /
analyzed: des bsam gtan gyi dbang du bya ba'i chos mang po thos te /
translated: One hears many teachings that are governed by the meditative absorptions.

original: bzung zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgyas par sbyar te /
analyzed: bzung zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgyas par sbyar te /
translated: One retains them, and so on as before.

original: des chos de dag nyid la brten nas /
analyzed: des chos de dag nyid la brten nas /
translated: One enters meditative equipoise on those very teachings.

original: gcig tu ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: gcig tu ma 'dres pa /
translated: One is not distracted from them.

original: bag yod pa brtun pa can sems gtad de /
analyzed: bag yod pa brtun pa can sems gtad de /
translated: One is heedful and diligent, and one focuses the mind.

original: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: One practices the teachings in accordance with the teachings.

original: man ngag gi stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na /🔽mkhan po'am / slob dpon nam /🔽bla ma lta bu gang yang rung ba'am /
analyzed: man ngag gi stobs kyis ji ltar zhe na / mkhan po'am / slob dpon nam / bla ma lta bu gang yang rung ba'am /
translated: How is it by the power of instruction?🔽One receives instructions and teachings from a preceptor, a master,

original: gzhan su yang rung ba dag las /🔽bsam gtan dang po'am /
analyzed: gzhan su yang rung ba dag las / bsam gtan dang po'am /
translated: a teacher, or anyone else who is like a guru.🔽One receives instructions and teachings that are in accordance with the first meditative absorption

original: lhag ma rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa thob nas /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa thob nas /
translated: or the remaining meditative absorptions.

original: des de nyid yid la byed cing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: des de nyid yid la byed cing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: He enters into the meditative concentration of the first meditation, and he is mindful of that very object.

original: de bas rnal 'byor ba ni rgyu'i stobs can dang / sbyor ba'i stobs can dang / dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / rnam pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: de bas rnal 'byor ba ni rgyu'i stobs can dang / sbyor ba'i stobs can dang / dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / rnam pa bzhi yod do //
translated: Thus, there are four types of yogis: those who have the power of the cause, those who have the power of application, those who have sharp faculties, and those who have dull faculties.

original: bsam gtan pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste /
translated: There are four types of meditators:

original: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / lta ba'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / nga rgyal gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / the tshom gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / lta ba'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / nga rgyal gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dang / the tshom gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa'o //
translated: those who are meditators with a predominance of craving, those who are meditators with a predominance of views, those who are meditators with a predominance of pride, and those who are meditators with a predominance of doubt.

original: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a meditator with a predominance of craving?

original: des thog ma kho nar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phan yon ni thos la nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma thos pas /
analyzed: des thog ma kho nar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phan yon ni thos la nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma thos pas /
translated: He hears only about the benefits of meditative concentration, but he does not hear about the means of deliverance.

original: de la shin tu phan yon du mthong nas /
analyzed: de la shin tu phan yon du mthong nas /
translated: Seeing great benefits in that,

original: brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: he enters into the first meditation through the cause of striving.

original: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang ro myong par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang ro myong par byed pa'o //
translated: After entering into meditative concentration, he also relishes the experience.

original: lta ba'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a meditator who is dominated by views?

original: 'di na la las bdag nyid kyi ston pa'am /
analyzed: 'di na la las bdag nyid kyi ston pa'am /
translated: Here, someone has heard that the self, the teacher,

original: gzhan yang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de lta bus dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de lta bus dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: or the world is permanent, and so on, and that by such means one becomes pure,

original: grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: is liberated,

original: de lta bur bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o zhes thos nas /
analyzed: de lta bur bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o zhes thos nas /
translated: and enters into the first meditative concentration up to the pinnacle of existence.

original: des lta ba @138a * //
analyzed: des lta ba @138a * //
translated: Having heard this, he relies on that view

original: de nyid la brten te brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: de nyid la brten te brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: and, through the power of his efforts, enters into the first meditative concentration.

original: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang /
analyzed: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang /
translated: After entering into meditative concentration,

original: bskal pa du ma'i sngon gyi lus rjes su dran nas /
analyzed: bskal pa du ma'i sngon gyi lus rjes su dran nas /
translated: he recalls the bodies of many eons in the past.

original: des 'di snyam du bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o snyam du sems te ;
analyzed: des 'di snyam du bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o snyam du sems te ;
translated: He thinks, “The self and the world are permanent.”

original: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
translated: Having arisen from that meditative concentration,

original: des lta ba de nyid brtan por byed cing /
analyzed: des lta ba de nyid brtan por byed cing /
translated: This stabilizes that view.

original: de'i rjes la yang 'dis ni bdag dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes la yang 'dis ni bdag dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, he thinks, “I will be purified by this.

original: grol bar 'gyur ro //🔽nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems shing /
analyzed: grol bar 'gyur ro // nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems shing /
translated: I will be liberated by this.🔽I will be released by this.”

original: rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o //
translated: He thinks, “I will think, I will think well.”

original: nga rgyal gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a meditator who is dominated by pride?

original: 'di ltar 'di na la las /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na la las /
translated: It is someone who thinks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa che ge mo bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad la snyoms par 'jug go zhes thos la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa che ge mo bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad la snyoms par 'jug go zhes thos la /
translated: “So-and-so, a venerable elder, has entered into the first meditative absorption, up to the peak of existence.”

original: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Having heard that, he thinks,

original: de yang snyoms par 'jug na /
analyzed: de yang snyoms par 'jug na /
translated: “If he can enter into meditative absorption,🔽why can’t I?”

original: bdag ci'i phyir snyoms par mi 'jug snyam mo //🔽de nga rgyal de la brten nas /
analyzed: bdag ci'i phyir snyoms par mi 'jug snyam mo //🔽de nga rgyal de la brten nas /
translated: He thinks,🔽“I will think, I will think well.”

original: brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang des rlom sems su byed pa'am yang na snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang des rlom sems su byed pa'am yang na snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Or else, when entering meditative concentration, one thinks,

original: bdag ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa yin gyi /
translated: “I have attained entry into the first meditative concentration.

original: gzhan ni de lta ma yin no snyam ste /
analyzed: gzhan ni de lta ma yin no snyam ste /
translated: Others are not like me.”

original: de nga rgyal de la brten nas /
analyzed: de nga rgyal de la brten nas /
translated: Based on that pride,

original: de'i rjes la yang sems shing rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o /🔽// / bam po bcu gsum pa /
analyzed: de'i rjes la yang sems shing rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o / // / bam po bcu gsum pa /
translated: one thinks about it, thinks about it a lot, and thinks about it thoroughly.

original: the tshom gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: the tshom gyi shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a meditative practitioner who is dominated by doubt?

original: 'di ltar 'di na la la rang bzhin gyis shes ba zhan cing shin tu rmun la /🔽de yang sngon zhi gnas spyod pa las /🔽de'i 'og tu bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na la la rang bzhin gyis shes ba zhan cing shin tu rmun la / de yang sngon zhi gnas spyod pa las / de'i 'og tu bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: In this case, a person is naturally weak-minded and very dull.🔽Moreover, previously, when practicing mental stability,🔽he or she enters meditative concentration.

original: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang /
analyzed: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu yang /
translated: After entering meditative concentration,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mngon par rtogs pa ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir rtsol bar byed mod kyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mngon par rtogs pa ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir rtsol bar byed mod kyi /
translated: Although they strive to attain the realization of the four noble truths that they have not yet attained,

original: de shes pa zhan pa dang / shin tu rmun pa'i phyir bden pa mngon par rtogs par byed mi nus pas /🔽de gzhan dag gi rtog pa la yang som nyi byed cing the tshom za ste /
analyzed: de shes pa zhan pa dang / shin tu rmun pa'i phyir bden pa mngon par rtogs par byed mi nus pas / de gzhan dag gi rtog pa la yang som nyi byed cing the tshom za ste /
translated: they are unable to realize the truths because their knowledge is weak and very dull.🔽They doubt and are uncertain about the thoughts of others.

original: som nyi de la brten cing de'i rjes la yang sems @138b shing rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o //
analyzed: som nyi de la brten cing de'i rjes la yang sems @138b shing rab tu sems la shin tu sems pa'o //
translated: They reflect and ponder and think a great deal about that doubt and uncertainty.

original: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /🔽dbang po rtul ba'am /🔽'dod chags spyod pa'am /
analyzed: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na / dbang po rtul ba'am / 'dod chags spyod pa'am /
translated: How do they become absorbed in meditative concentration that is associated with relishing?🔽They are dull-faculty persons🔽or persons who are dominated by passion

original: nyon mongs pa shas che ba yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa shas che ba yin te /
translated: or persons whose reactive emotions are strong.

original: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phan yon ni thos la zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phan yon ni thos la zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The benefits of becoming absorbed in the first meditative concentration are that one hears sounds,

original: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bya ste /
analyzed: sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bya ste /
translated: and so on, up to “one has a strong tendency to craving.”

original: des de'i gong du nges par 'byung ba mi shes pas ro myong bar byed cing nges par 'dzin la /
analyzed: des de'i gong du nges par 'byung ba mi shes pas ro myong bar byed cing nges par 'dzin la /
translated: Since it does not understand the renunciation of the higher absorptions, it experiences them, seizes them and

original: lhag par zhen cing lhag par zhen nas gnas te /
analyzed: lhag par zhen cing lhag par zhen nas gnas te /
translated: abides in them with attachment and intense attachment.

original: gang la myong bar byed pa ni de las langs pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang la myong bar byed pa ni de las langs pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: That which is experienced is called arisen from that.

original: gang ges myong bar byed pa de ni snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang ges myong bar byed pa de ni snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which experiences is called entered meditative attainment.

original: dag pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: dag pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does one enter pure absorption?

original: dbang po 'bring dam dbang po rnon po yin te /
analyzed: dbang po 'bring dam dbang po rnon po yin te /
translated: One is either of medium or sharp faculty.

original: nyon mongs pa cha mnyam pa'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa cha mnyam pa'am /
translated: One is either of balanced or weak afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa shas chung la gzhan las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro myong ba dang / nyes dmigs dang gong du nges par 'byung ba yang thos te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa shas chung la gzhan las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro myong ba dang / nyes dmigs dang gong du nges par 'byung ba yang thos te /
translated: One hears about the experience, disadvantages and higher renunciation of the first absorption from others and enters meditative attainment.

original: brtson pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang nyes dmigs de nyid yid la byed cing gong du nges par 'byung ba shes pas ro myong bar mi byed do //
analyzed: brtson pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang nyes dmigs de nyid yid la byed cing gong du nges par 'byung ba shes pas ro myong bar mi byed do //
translated: Having entered meditative attainment, he attends to the disadvantages of that meditative attainment and does not savor it, because he knows that there is a higher escape.

original: zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does he enter meditative attainment in the uncontaminated absorptions?

original: 'di ltar 'di na la la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na la la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'am /
translated: In this case, a certain person is a follower of faith or a follower of reality.

original: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i shas chung ba'i rang bzhin can yin la /
analyzed: chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i shas chung ba'i rang bzhin can yin la /
translated: He has a nature that is weak in terms of the mental afflictions.

original: des thog ma kho nar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mngon par rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: des thog ma kho nar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mngon par rtogs pa'am /
translated: From the very beginning, he realizes the four noble truths.

original: yang na mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed pa na /
analyzed: yang na mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed pa na /
translated: Or, he makes effort in order to realize them.

original: des rnam pa dang / mtshan ma dang rtags gang dag gis bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma dang / rtags de dag yid la mi byed kyi de la yod pa'i gzugs su gtogs pa nas rnam par shes par gtogs pa'i bar gang yin ba'i chos de dag la /
analyzed: des rnam pa dang / mtshan ma dang rtags gang dag gis bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma dang / rtags de dag yid la mi byed kyi de la yod pa'i gzugs su gtogs pa nas rnam par shes par gtogs pa'i bar gang yin ba'i chos de dag la /
translated: He does not attend to the aspects, signs and indications by which he enters the first concentration, but he attends to those phenomena that exist there, from form to consciousness,

original: nad la sogs pa dag gi rnam pa dag gis yid la byed de /
analyzed: nad la sogs pa dag gi rnam pa dag gis yid la byed de /
translated: with the aspects of disease and so on.

original: 'du byed de dag gis sems skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / ldog @139a * //
analyzed: 'du byed de dag gis sems skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / ldog @139a * //
translated: Those formations cause his mind to be discouraged, frightened and

original: par byed la /
analyzed: par byed la /
translated: to turn away.

original: bdud rtsi'i khams su yang sgrub ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i khams su yang sgrub ste /
translated: He also establishes the element of nectar.

original: de ltar zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: de ltar zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: Thus he enters uncontaminated concentration.

original: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does he enter concentration that is conducive to degeneration?

original: dbang po rtul zhing dman pa la mos ba yin la /
analyzed: dbang po rtul zhing dman pa la mos ba yin la /
translated: He has dull faculties and is of low aspiration.

original: de brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nyid ni /
analyzed: de brtson pa'i rgyus bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nyid ni /
translated: By the cause of his striving, he enters the first concentration.

original: de la dga' ba dang bde ba dang / phan yon mi bzod pas /
analyzed: de la dga' ba dang bde ba dang / phan yon mi bzod pas /
translated: He is unable to bear the joy, bliss, and benefit of that concentration.

original: bsam gtan de las yongs su nyams te /
analyzed: bsam gtan de las yongs su nyams te /
translated: He falls away from that concentration.

original: dbang po rnams gsal bar ma byas kyi bar du /
analyzed: dbang po rnams gsal bar ma byas kyi bar du /
translated: As long as he does not make his faculties clear,

original: ji lta ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ba de lta de ltar yongs su nyams pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ba de lta de ltar yongs su nyams pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: he will fall away from the concentration, no matter how much he cultivates it.

original: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does one enter the meditative attainment that is conducive to stability?

original: dbang po 'bring ngam /
analyzed: dbang po 'bring ngam /
translated: One who has middling faculties

original: dbang po rnon po yin la des de'i phan yon thos pa nas /
analyzed: dbang po rnon po yin la des de'i phan yon thos pa nas /
translated: or sharp faculties hears about the benefits of that concentration,

original: ro myong ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bya ste /
analyzed: ro myong ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bya ste /
translated: and cultivates it as much as one who is accompanied by the experience of its taste.

original: des de'i ro myong bas gang du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: des de'i ro myong bas gang du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: But he does not attain definite emergence from it through the experience of its taste.

original: mar yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mar yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: He also does not fall away from it.

original: khyad par du 'gyur ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par du 'gyur ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How does one enter the meditative attainment that is conducive to distinction?

original: des de'i nges par 'byung ba yang thos la /
analyzed: des de'i nges par 'byung ba yang thos la /
translated: He hears about the definite emergence from it,

original: de snyoms par 'jug pa des chog par mi 'dzin pas /
analyzed: de snyoms par 'jug pa des chog par mi 'dzin pas /
translated: He does not consider that absorption to be enough,

original: de myong bar yang mi byed la /
analyzed: de myong bar yang mi byed la /
translated: and he does not experience it.

original: gong du rtsol te de'i phyir khyad par yang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong du rtsol te de'i phyir khyad par yang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He strives for more, and so he attains a higher distinction.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does one enter the stages conducive to penetration?

original: thams cad du 'jig tshogs la nyes dmigs su lta ba yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du 'jig tshogs la nyes dmigs su lta ba yin te /
translated: One views the perishing aggregates as a calamity in every way,

original: de'i phyir zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: and so one enters the uncontaminated.

original: zag pa med pa thams cad ni shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ste dper na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa thams cad ni shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ste dper na /
translated: All uncontaminated states are called stages conducive to penetration because they are the final limit of the path of seeing.

original: nor bu phug zin pa dang / rdza ma phug zin pa dang / rtsig pa phug zin pa zhes bya ba bzhin te /
analyzed: nor bu phug zin pa dang / rdza ma phug zin pa dang / rtsig pa phug zin pa zhes bya ba bzhin te /
translated: For example, they are like a gem that has been pierced, a pot that has been fired, and a wall that has been plastered.

original: de las dbug tu med pas na de la phug zin pa zhes bya'o //🔽de bzhin du de las nges par dbyer med pas na /
analyzed: de las dbug tu med pas na de la phug zin pa zhes bya'o // de bzhin du de las nges par dbyer med pas na /
translated: They are called pierced because they cannot be pierced again.

original: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In the same way, they are called stages conducive to penetration because one cannot be separated from them.

original: bar chad med par ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: bar chad med par ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does one enter meditative attainment without interval?

original: 'di ltar 'di na kha cig bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du yongs su ma dag pa dang / yongs su ma byang ba thob pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na kha cig bsam gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du yongs su ma dag pa dang / yongs su ma byang ba thob pas /
translated: In this way, some obtain the first meditative stabilization up to the summit of existence that is not pure and not purified.

original: de srid @139b pa'i rtse mo dang bsam gtan dang po'i bar du lugs su byung ba dang / lugs su byung ba ma yin par snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: de srid @139b pa'i rtse mo dang bsam gtan dang po'i bar du lugs su byung ba dang / lugs su byung ba ma yin par snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: They enter meditative attainment in forward and reverse order from the summit of existence to the first meditative stabilization.

original: thod rgal du ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: thod rgal du ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: How does one enter meditative attainment by skipping?

original: de dag nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because those are pure.

original: bsam gtan dang po las langs ma thag tu bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po las langs ma thag tu bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: Immediately after rising from the first meditative stabilization, one enters the third meditative stabilization.

original: de las langs nas nam mkha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: de las langs nas nam mkha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: After rising from that, one enters the sphere of infinite space.

original: de las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go //🔽gsum pa las 'das par thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug ba ni med de /
analyzed: de las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go // gsum pa las 'das par thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug ba ni med de /
translated: After rising from that, one enters the sphere of nothingness.

original: shin tu ring ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: shin tu ring ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: One does not enter meditative attainment by skipping over the third meditative stabilization because it is too far removed.

original: / lugs su mi 'byung ba la yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: / lugs su mi 'byung ba la yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same applies to the reverse order.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyis /🔽nges par byung ba ni ma gtogs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyis / nges par byung ba ni ma gtogs te /
translated: The exception is the Tathāgatas and the Bodhisattvas who have emerged from the second incalculable eon,

original: de gnyis la ni ci dga' dgur snyoms par 'jug pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis la ni ci dga' dgur snyoms par 'jug pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they have mastery over the meditative concentrations and can enter them at will.

original: bsam gtan rnams la ji ltar spel bar spyod ce na /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la ji ltar spel bar spyod ce na /
translated: How do they practice the meditative concentrations in a combined manner?

original: 'di ltar 'di na la la zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi thob la /🔽snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob par 'dod pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na la la zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi thob la / snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob par 'dod pa'am /
translated: In this regard, some people who have attained the four meditative concentrations with and without fluxes🔽and have attained mastery over meditative attainment,🔽either desire to experience the result of attaining mastery over meditative attainment,

original: snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong bar 'dod pas /
translated: or desire to experience the result of attaining mastery over meditative attainment.

original: rgyun chags par zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gcig nas gcig tu spel mar zag pa dang bcas pa las langs ma thag tu zag pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa las langs ma thag tu zag pa dang bcas pa la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: rgyun chags par zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gcig nas gcig tu spel mar zag pa dang bcas pa las langs ma thag tu zag pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa las langs ma thag tu zag pa dang bcas pa la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: He enters meditative attainment from one contaminated or uncontaminated meditative stabilization to another, and he enters meditative attainment from contaminated to uncontaminated and from uncontaminated to contaminated meditative stabilizations immediately after rising from them.

original: de tsam gyis na de yongs su grub par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de tsam gyis na de yongs su grub par rig par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that he is fully accomplished in meditative attainment to that extent.

original: de gang du gang gi tshe ji srid du 'dod pa der de'i tshe de srid du snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: de gang du gang gi tshe ji srid du 'dod pa der de'i tshe de srid du snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang ba'o //
translated: He enters meditative attainment wherever, whenever, and for as long as he wishes. This is mastery of meditative attainment.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang ba'i 'bras bu ni tshe 'di nyid la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang ba'i 'bras bu ni tshe 'di nyid la /
translated: The result of mastery of meditative attainment is that in this life

original: de'i bde ba la gnas ba ches gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / des de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i lam thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o //🔽gal te @140a * //
analyzed: de'i bde ba la gnas ba ches gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / des de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i lam thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o // gal te @140a * //
translated: and the path for accomplishing the liberations, the bases of subjugation, and the bases of totality becomes purified.

original: nyon mongs pa'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na ni /
translated: If one dies while still having the afflictions,

original: de'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: then one is reborn in the pure abodes.

original: bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa chung du dang 'bring dang / chen po'i bye brag gis thams cad dus gsum du 'gyur te rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa la sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa chung du dang 'bring dang / chen po'i bye brag gis thams cad dus gsum du 'gyur te rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa la sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: The small, medium, and great meditative attainments of the absorptions are the three times. They are associated with investigation and analysis, as previously explained.

original: rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni tshangs pa chen po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni tshangs pa chen po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By cultivating concentration that is mere analysis in the absence of thought, one attains the state of Mahabrahma.

original: spel mar bsgom pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / shin tu che ba dang / rab tu che bar bsgoms pas gnas gtsang ma'i lnga grub po //🔽de la dag pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pas na /
analyzed: spel mar bsgom pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / shin tu che ba dang / rab tu che bar bsgoms pas gnas gtsang ma'i lnga grub po // de la dag pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pas na /
translated: The five pure abodes are established by cultivating the small, medium, great, extremely great and very great mixed meditation.

original: bsam gtan gyis rnams su skye bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis rnams su skye bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Therein, one should understand that by entering meditative attainment in pure absorption, one is born in the absorptions.

original: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pas ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pas ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One is not born there by means of enjoyment and possessing enjoyment.

original: gal te skyes nas ro myang bar byed na yang /
analyzed: gal te skyes nas ro myang bar byed na yang /
translated: If one is born there and enjoys it,

original: de las 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will die and transmigrate from there.

original: ji ste dag pa bsgom na de nyid du skye ba'am /
analyzed: ji ste dag pa bsgom na de nyid du skye ba'am /
translated: If one cultivates purity, one is born there or

original: yang na 'og mar skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na 'og mar skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one is born below.

original: gong ma la snyoms par 'jug na ni steng du 'phar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gong ma la snyoms par 'jug na ni steng du 'phar bar 'gyur te /
translated: If one enters meditative attainment in the higher realms, one will rise up.

original: sngar 'di snyoms par zhugs nas de'i 'og tu der skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar 'di snyoms par zhugs nas de'i 'og tu der skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One enters into this meditative attainment previously and then one is reborn there subsequently.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni /
translated: Because the ordinary worldling who is not detached

original: der skye bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: der skye bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: is not reborn there.

original: snyoms par ma zhugs pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snyoms par ma zhugs pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because one who has not entered into this meditative attainment is not detached.

original: 'di dang der snyoms par zhugs pa gnyis la yang bde ba'i bye brag ni med la /
analyzed: 'di dang der snyoms par zhugs pa gnyis la yang bde ba'i bye brag ni med la /
translated: Moreover, there is no difference in the pleasure of these two meditative attainments,

original: lus kyi bye brag ni yod do //
analyzed: lus kyi bye brag ni yod do //
translated: but there is a difference in the body.

original: yid la byed pa dang mtshan ma bsgom pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: yid la byed pa dang mtshan ma bsgom pa rdzogs so /
translated: The cultivation of attention and the cultivation of signs are completed.

original: // / mdo sde bsdu ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: // / mdo sde bsdu ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the summary of the Sutras?

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
translated: The eight liberations

original: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: are the same as the eight liberations explained previously.

original: rnam par grol ba ni mos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba ni mos par 'gyur te /
translated: One becomes liberated through faith in the seven.

original: de bas na rnam par thar pa bdun no //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par thar pa bdun no //
translated: Therefore, there are seven liberations.

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba la mi phyogs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad de /
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba la mi phyogs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad de /
translated: The eighth liberation is the cessation of conceptualization and sensation.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o //
translated: These are called the eight liberations.

original: gzugs can gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs can gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na /
translated: How does one who has form see forms?

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par 'gyur te /
translated: One who is born in the realm of desire

original: @140b 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni thob la /
analyzed: @140b 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni thob la /
translated: and who has attained detachment from desire

original: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni ma bral te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni ma bral te /
translated: but has not attained detachment from form

original: de de ltar grol bar gyur na /
analyzed: de de ltar grol bar gyur na /
translated: and who is liberated in this way

original: gang dag las grol ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs de dag nyid yid la byed de /
analyzed: gang dag las grol ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs de dag nyid yid la byed de /
translated: brings to mind those forms that are experienced in the realm of desire.

original: snang zhing gsal ba dang bcas pa'i mtshan mas mos par byed de //
analyzed: snang zhing gsal ba dang bcas pa'i mtshan mas mos par byed de //
translated: He becomes intent on them through the sign of their appearance and clarity.

original: de rnam pa gnyis kyis gzugs can yin te /🔽gang 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par gyur pa dang / gang gzugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob nas /
analyzed: de rnam pa gnyis kyis gzugs can yin te / gang 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par gyur pa dang / gang gzugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob nas /
translated: He has form in two ways:

original: snang ba dang bcas pa la yang mos pa'i phyir ro //🔽gzugs rnams la lta zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snang ba dang bcas pa la yang mos pa'i phyir ro // gzugs rnams la lta zhes bya ba la /
translated: because he is born in the realm of desire and because he has attained the meditative absorption of the realm of form.🔽He is intent on them through their appearance.🔽How does one see forms?

original: ji lta bu la ni lta /
analyzed: ji lta bu la ni lta /
translated: What does one see?

original: ci'i phyir na ni lta zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na ni lta zhe na /
translated: Why does one see?

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams su rnam par bshig pa'i gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po rnams gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams su rnam par bshig pa'i gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po rnams gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: The bases of subjugation are the forms of the desire realm that are destroyed, the small forms that are good color, bad color, and good color.

original: chen po rnams la zhes bya ba yang de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po rnams la zhes bya ba yang de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o //
translated: The great forms should be expanded in the same way.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are they called bases of subjugation?

original: yon tan khyad par can mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yon tan khyad par can mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are the means of accomplishing special qualities.

original: sbyor ba la yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i don du ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba la yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i don du ste /
translated: They are for the sake of training in application,

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad ba'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon nas shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad ba'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon nas shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the means of accomplishing the bases of subjugation, the bases of totality, the superknowledges, the liberations, the perception spheres of mastery, the perception spheres of totalization, the unentangled qualities, and so on.

original: de sngon gzugs de dag las 'dod chags dang bral du zin kyang /
analyzed: de sngon gzugs de dag las 'dod chags dang bral du zin kyang /
translated: Even though one has already become free from attachment to those forms,

original: des de dag la mos pa'i dbang ma thob pas na /
analyzed: des de dag la mos pa'i dbang ma thob pas na /
translated: one has not yet obtained the power of conviction in them.

original: de thob par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du mos par byed do //🔽nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas /
analyzed: de thob par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du mos par byed do // nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas /
translated: In order to attain it, he repeatedly aspires to it.🔽How does one, perceiving no form internally,

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na /
translated: see forms externally?

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes bar 'gyur la /
translated: One who is born in the desire realm

original: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni bral /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni bral /
translated: and is free from attachment to the form realm

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mngon du mi byed la /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mngon du mi byed la /
translated: but has not actualized the formless attainments

original: de'i 'du shes dang ni ldan te /
analyzed: de'i 'du shes dang ni ldan te /
translated: and possesses the perception of form

original: nang gi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed la /
analyzed: nang gi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed la /
translated: does not attend to the internal sign of light

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la mos par byed do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la mos par byed do //
translated: but aspires to external forms.

original: gang dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa de dag ni de'i phyi rol zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa de dag ni de'i phyi rol zhes bya'o //
translated: Those from which one is free are called “external.”

original: de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa zhes bya ste /🔽gang gzugs med @141a * //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa zhes bya ste / gang gzugs med @141a * //
translated: This is called “perceiving no form internally” in two ways:

original: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob la /
analyzed: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob la /
translated: One who has attained the formless attainments

original: snyoms par 'jug pa de yang bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / gang nang gi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa de yang bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / gang nang gi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed pa ste /
translated: This meditative attainment is known by oneself, and it is the non-attention to the internal signs of illumination.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas te /
analyzed: sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas te /
translated: The liberation of beauty is manifested by the body.

original: bsgrubs nas ji ltar gnas she na /🔽'di ltar 'di na kha cig btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag cing /
analyzed: bsgrubs nas ji ltar gnas she na / 'di ltar 'di na kha cig btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag cing /
translated: How does one abide having accomplished it?

original: yongs su byang ba thob par gyur la /
analyzed: yongs su byang ba thob par gyur la /
translated: Here, someone obtains the purity and purification of equanimity and mindfulness.

original: des de la brten nas sdug pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: des de la brten nas sdug pa bsgoms te /
translated: On the basis of that, he cultivates beauty.

original: 'phags pa'i rnam pas yongs su rdzogs pa ni sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i rnam pas yongs su rdzogs pa ni sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The liberation of beauty is called the complete perfection of the noble aspects.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rnam pa gsum gyi phyir te /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gyi phyir te /
translated: Because of three aspects:

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la rnam par 'das pa dang / g-yo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la rnam par 'das pa dang / g-yo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: transcending pleasure and pain, being free from all movement, and being well-purified.

original: lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Manifested by the body means:

original: gnas pa des 'phags pa rnams shas cher gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa des 'phags pa rnams shas cher gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the noble ones abide in it for the most part.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: The liberation of the base of infinite space is as follows:

original: de las 'dod chags dang bral la /
analyzed: de las 'dod chags dang bral la /
translated: One is free from attachment to the first absorption and

original: nam mkha' nyid la mos par byed pa'o //🔽rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid la mos par byed pa'o // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: one focuses on space.🔽The liberation of the base of infinite consciousness is similar to that.

original: de las 'dod chags dang bral la /
analyzed: de las 'dod chags dang bral la /
translated: One is free from attachment to the base of infinite space and

original: de nyid la mos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la mos par byed pa'o //
translated: one focuses on that.

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
translated: The liberation of the base of nothingness is as follows:

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched thob la /
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched thob la /
translated: One attains the base of nothingness and

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mos par byed pa'o //
translated: one focuses on the base of infinite consciousness.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par thar pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par thar pa ni /
translated: The liberation of the peak of cyclic existence is as follows:

original: gzhan la mos par mi byed de /
analyzed: gzhan la mos par mi byed de /
translated: One does not focus on anything else.

original: ji srid du zad par gyi 'du shes 'byung ba de srid du mos par bya dgos so //
analyzed: ji srid du zad par gyi 'du shes 'byung ba de srid du mos par bya dgos so //
translated: One must focus on the base of neither existence nor nonexistence for as long as the conception of complete extinction arises.

original: sngar mos te yongs su sbyang ba byas nas /
analyzed: sngar mos te yongs su sbyang ba byas nas /
translated: Having previously focused on it and trained in it,

original: de'i 'og tu zil gyis mnan te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zil gyis mnan te /
translated: one then focuses on it and subdues it.

original: lta ba'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ces bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ces bya'o //
translated: They are called bases of subjugation because they subjugate by means of the view.

original: zil gyis gnon pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
translated: Subjugation should be understood as fivefold:

original: chung bar zil gyis gnon pa ni /🔽dper na bzo la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis lhag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chung bar zil gyis gnon pa ni / dper na bzo la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis lhag pa'i phyir /
translated: 1. subjugation of the small,🔽as when one is considered superior to another because of some quality,

original: des gzhan chung bar rtsi ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: des gzhan chung bar rtsi ba lta bu'o //
translated: such as skill in the arts, etc.

original: nyams stobs chung bar zil gyis gnon pa ni /
analyzed: nyams stobs chung bar zil gyis gnon pa ni /
translated: 2. subjugation of the weak,

original: dper na stobs dang ldan pas ches stobs chung ngu brnyas pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na stobs dang ldan pas ches stobs chung ngu brnyas pa lta bu'o //
translated: as when a strong person dominates a weaker one.

original: mi snang bar zil gyis gnon pa ni /🔽dper na rtsig pa la @141b sogs pas bar du bcad pa dang / gsang sngags sam /
analyzed: mi snang bar zil gyis gnon pa ni / dper na rtsig pa la @141b sogs pas bar du bcad pa dang / gsang sngags sam /
translated: 3. subjugation by invisibility,🔽as when one is hidden by a wall, etc.,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: or by mantra or by magical power.

original: sun 'byin pas zil gyis gnon pa ni /
analyzed: sun 'byin pas zil gyis gnon pa ni /
translated: 4. subjugation by refutation,

original: dper na nyon mongs pa rnams sun phyung nas spong bar byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nyon mongs pa rnams sun phyung nas spong bar byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: as when one refutes the afflictions and abandons them.

original: dbang byed pas zil gyis gnon pa ni /
analyzed: dbang byed pas zil gyis gnon pa ni /
translated: 5. subjugation by control,

original: dper na rje bos bran la ci dga' dgur bsko ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rje bos bran la ci dga' dgur bsko ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, a master can order a slave to do whatever he wants.

original: don 'di'i skabs su ni mi snang bar zil gyis gnon pa dang / dbang byed pas zil gyis gnon pa gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: don 'di'i skabs su ni mi snang bar zil gyis gnon pa dang / dbang byed pas zil gyis gnon pa gzung bar bya ste /
translated: In this context, the subjugation of non-appearance and the subjugation of mastery should be understood.

original: sngar ni rnam par thar pa rnams la mos pas dbang byed do //
analyzed: sngar ni rnam par thar pa rnams la mos pas dbang byed do //
translated: Previously, one has mastery over the liberations through the will.

original: de'i 'og tu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mchad rnams la zil gyis gnon pas dbang byed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mchad rnams la zil gyis gnon pas dbang byed do //
translated: After that, one has mastery over the subjugations through subjugation.

original: de la gzugs chung ngu dag mthong zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la gzugs chung ngu dag mthong zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In this regard, one sees small forms.

original: sems can dang / yo byad ces bya ba rnams so //🔽chen po rnams zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can dang / yo byad ces bya ba rnams so // chen po rnams zhes bya ba ni /
translated: These are sentient beings and utensils.

original: khyim dang gnas khang la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: khyim dang gnas khang la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Large forms are houses, buildings, etc.

original: kha dog bzang po ni kha dog yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa rnams te /
analyzed: kha dog bzang po ni kha dog yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa rnams te /
translated: Beautiful colors are those that are pleasing.

original: gcig tu nges par mdzes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig tu nges par mdzes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are beautiful because they are exclusively attractive.

original: de las bzlog pa ni kha dog ngan pa'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni kha dog ngan pa'o //
translated: Ugly colors are the opposite of that.

original: ngan pa ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i sgo nas yid du mi 'ong ba rnams so //
analyzed: ngan pa ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i sgo nas yid du mi 'ong ba rnams so //
translated: The bad is the unpleasant sounds, smells, tastes, and tangibles.

original: de las bzlog pa ni bzang po rnams te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni bzang po rnams te /
translated: The good is the opposite of that.

original: sems can dang yo byad dang / gzhal med khang de dag gi kha dog ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: sems can dang yo byad dang / gzhal med khang de dag gi kha dog ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The colors of those sentient beings, utensils, and palaces are of four kinds.

original: zil gyis mnan nas shes zhes bya ba ni me snang bar byas shing dmigs pa la mos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mnan nas shes zhes bya ba ni me snang bar byas shing dmigs pa la mos par byed pa'o //
translated: Having dominated, one knows means that one illuminates the fire and focuses on the object of meditation.

original: de ltar 'du shes zhes bya ba ni zil gyis gnon pa'i 'du shes so //
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes zhes bya ba ni zil gyis gnon pa'i 'du shes so //
translated: One has the perception of that means the perception of domination.

original: zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni /
translated: The bases of mastery are as follows.

original: mos par bya ba'i dngos po'i zad par gyi skye mched la mos bar byed do //🔽de la gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mos par bya ba'i dngos po'i zad par gyi skye mched la mos bar byed do // de la gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One focuses on the object of meditation of the bases of mastery.

original: 'phags pa la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that, there is no duality means that there is no distinction of self and other in the noble ones.

original: chad med pa ni thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: chad med pa ni thams cad kyi'o //
translated: There is no interruption means that there is no interruption of the noble ones.

original: gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched 'di gnyis ci'i phyir rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched 'di gnyis ci'i phyir rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: Why are the bases of existence and tangibility established?

original: 'di gnyis ni bdag dang / pha rol gnyi ga'i rgyud dang / gzugs can gyi khams thams cad na yod la /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni bdag dang / pha rol gnyi ga'i rgyud dang / gzugs can gyi khams thams cad na yod la /
translated: These two exist in the stream of both oneself and others, and in all the physical elements.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa kho na yin pa dang / dri dang ro rnams kyang kun na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa kho na yin pa dang / dri dang ro rnams kyang kun na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The eyes, etc. exist only in one’s own stream, and odor and taste do not exist everywhere.

original: de rnams kyi nang na gzugs can rnams ni gzugs kyi khams man chad kyi zad par gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o//
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang na gzugs can rnams ni gzugs kyi khams man chad kyi zad par gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o//
translated: Among them, the physical bases are the meditative attainments of totalization up to the element of form.

original: @142a * // gzugs med pa dag na ni nam mkha' thams cad du 'gro ba yin pas na /
analyzed: @142a * // gzugs med pa dag na ni nam mkha' thams cad du 'gro ba yin pas na /
translated: In the formless realm, space is omnipresent.

original: de'i phyir der zad par gyi skye mched du gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir der zad par gyi skye mched du gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, it is established as a base of totalization there.

original: rnam par shes pa yang yul zad par gyi spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang yul zad par gyi spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Consciousness is also the domain of totalization of the object.

original: thog ma kho nar ni rnal 'byor pas mos par byed do //
analyzed: thog ma kho nar ni rnal 'byor pas mos par byed do //
translated: First, the yogi/nī imagines.

original: de'i 'og tu zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zil gyis gnon to //
translated: After that, he/she dominates.

original: de nas zil gyis gnon pa la dbang thob nas de'i 'og tu zad par gyi skye mched de nyid la ci dga' dgur mos par byed do //
analyzed: de nas zil gyis gnon pa la dbang thob nas de'i 'og tu zad par gyi skye mched de nyid la ci dga' dgur mos par byed do //
translated: Then, having obtained mastery over the subjugations, he then freely imagines the bases of mastery as he wishes.

original: de ltar de dag gi go rims ni de yin no //
analyzed: de ltar de dag gi go rims ni de yin no //
translated: This is the order of the bases of mastery.

original: gzugs kyi zad par gyi skye mchad brgyad yongs su dag pa rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i mos pa dang dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzugs kyi zad par gyi skye mchad brgyad yongs su dag pa rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i mos pa dang dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: By means of the eight bases of mastery of the totality of form, he accomplishes the supernormal knowledge of the transformation of things, which is the will of the noble ones.

original: de ji lta ji ltar mos pa dang / ji srid kyi bar du bsgyur ba de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar mos pa dang / ji srid kyi bar du bsgyur ba de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: Whatever he wills and transforms, that is exactly how it is.

original: gser la sogs pa de dag gis kyang bya ba byed nus so //
analyzed: gser la sogs pa de dag gis kyang bya ba byed nus so //
translated: And he is able to perform the functions of those things, such as gold, etc.

original: zad par rnam par shes pa'i skya mched yongs su dag pas ni /
analyzed: zad par rnam par shes pa'i skya mched yongs su dag pas ni /
translated: By means of the pure base of totality of consciousness,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / smon nas shes pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / smon nas shes pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do //
translated: he accomplishes the supernormal knowledge of the absence of conflict, the analytical knowledges, the knowledge resulting from a resolve, etc.

original: zad par nam mkha'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni gang 'dod pa de nam mkhar sgyur bar byed de /
analyzed: zad par nam mkha'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni gang 'dod pa de nam mkhar sgyur bar byed de /
translated: By means of the complete purity of the sphere of infinite space, one transforms whatever one wishes into space.

original: dper na rdza mkhan dang / lcags mgar dang / gser mgar rnams kyis 'jim pa la sogs pa rnams thog mar ni sbyor bar byed kyi /
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan dang / lcags mgar dang / gser mgar rnams kyis 'jim pa la sogs pa rnams thog mar ni sbyor bar byed kyi /
translated: For example, potters, blacksmiths, and goldsmiths first prepare the clay, etc.,

original: de dag shin tu yongs su byang bar byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag shin tu yongs su byang bar byas pa ma yin te /
translated: but they do not completely refine it.

original: rnam par thar pa'i gnas skabs kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i gnas skabs kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The state of the liberations is like that.

original: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi gnas skabs ni /
analyzed: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi gnas skabs ni /
translated: The state of the spheres of mastery is

original: ji ltar shin tu yongs su byang bar byas pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar shin tu yongs su byang bar byas pa lta bu'o //
translated: like that of the completely refined gold.

original: zad par gyi skye mched kyi gnas skabs ni /🔽ji ltar shin tu yongs su byang bar byas nas /
analyzed: zad par gyi skye mched kyi gnas skabs ni / ji ltar shin tu yongs su byang bar byas nas /
translated: The state of the spheres of totality is🔽like that of the completely refined gold

original: ji srid 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su bsgyur ba lta bur blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su bsgyur ba lta bur blta bar bya'o //
translated: which is transformed into whatever one wishes.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Concentration is threefold:🔽emptiness,🔽wishlessness, and

original: stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: signlessness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samadhi of emptiness?

original: sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / gang zag nyid med pa las brtsams nas sems kyi gnas ba rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / gang zag nyid med pa las brtsams nas sems kyi gnas ba rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is one-pointedness of mind which is based on the non-existence of a being, a living being, a nourishing being, or a person.

original: de la stong pa nyid rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: There are four kinds of emptiness:

original: rtog pa'i stong ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rtog pa'i stong ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The emptiness of conceptual differentiation is as follows.

original: rtag @142b pa nas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bar dag gis chos thams cad stong par so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rtag @142b pa nas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bar dag gis chos thams cad stong par so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: It is the conceptual differentiation of all dharmas as empty by means of the view of individuality, etc.

original: de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The emptiness of the result is as follows.

original: sems 'khrug pa med cing rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: sems 'khrug pa med cing rnam par grol ba /
translated: It is the mind which is free from agitation and distraction,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong pa'o //
translated: and which is empty of all the defilements such as passion, etc.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The emptiness of inner is as follows.

original: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis lus stong pa'o //
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis lus stong pa'o //
translated: It is the body which is empty for those who are attached to the notion of “I” and “mine” and to the feeling of “I am. ”

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The emptiness of outer is as follows.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams /
translated: The five sense pleasures

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis stong pa ste /
translated: are empty of the desire realm’s desire.

original: ji skad du rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das pas phyi stong pa nyid lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji skad du rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das pas phyi stong pa nyid lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is said, “Having fully transcended all perceptions of form, one abides in the realization and accomplishment of the emptiness of the external.”

original: gzugs kyi 'du shes ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi 'du shes la bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'du shes ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi 'du shes la bya ste /
translated: Here, the perception of form refers to the perception of the sense pleasures.

original: de'i 'du shes las byung ba'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir te de phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'du shes las byung ba'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir te de phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Because the desire that arises from that perception is abandoned, it is called the emptiness of the external.

original: rnal 'byor pa yang res 'ga' ni de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yang res 'ga' ni de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid yid la byed do //
translated: Sometimes, the yogi/nī also brings to mind the emptiness of the external through the result of that, emptiness.

original: res 'ga' ni nang stong pa nyid yid la byed do //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni nang stong pa nyid yid la byed do //
translated: Sometimes, he or she brings to mind the emptiness of the internal.
